title: cryptoworkers
author: cryptoworkers
content: I have my own Skrill account for last 7 years, its fully verified and you can transfer 15.000e per month. I have loyalty badge, True skrill badge. Card is expired (you can order new one there for 10e) and i will not use it anymore since i fully transfered to crypto. I will sell it for 500€ ,who needs it feel free to contact me here on dm or on tg : https://t.me/faucetmillionarebosshttps://i.ibb.co/djspgnr/Untitled.png

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoworkers on June 06, 2022, 07:34:36 AMI have my own Skrill account for last 7 years, its fully verified and you can transfer 15.000e per month. I have loyalty badge, True skrill badge. Card is expired (you can order new one there for 10e) and i will not use it anymore since i fully transfered to crypto. I will sell it for 500€ ,who needs it feel free to contact me here on dm or on tg : https://t.me/faucetmillionarebossI just want to say that if anyone misuse it then you will be responsible for that as all the document is provided  by you while you have verified the account. Those who might be interested to buy this account can be cautioned that you might be loser if op recover the account as op have all the info to recover the account. And another thing is that when you will use it from another country than the op then your account can be locked and you might have to verify your account but that is not possible as you are not the real owner of the account.

comments.author: cryptoworkers
comments.body: I assume that person who are working with accounts knows what and how he do it to not get suspended or anything.Thanks.
